message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  While I appreciate your interest, $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $10,500? This would give you a good deal, and still allow me to get a fair price. Let me know what you think!
I'm still interested in the product, but $10,500 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $10,000. Can we meet at $10,000?
